head.supplied: ¶ [Dr Ferdinand Mueller, Director of the Botanic Garden of Melbourne in Australia, sends thanks for his nomination as member of the Society and promises to send materials for the collections and publ...

div.p: To the Imperial Society of Naturalists of Moscow

Letter not found. For the text given here, see Bulletin de la Société impériale des Naturalistes de Moscou, vol. 39 (1866), Séances, p. 60. M's letter was read at a meeting of the Society on 20 October 1866. See also Imperial Society of Naturalists of Moscow to M, 17 February 1866.
[Mr. le Dr. Ferdinand Muller, Directeur du Jardin botanique de Melbourne en Australie, remercie pour sa nomination comme membre de la Société et promet de lui envoyer des matériaux pour les collections et les publications de la Société.]
